name: Dino Game GB Studio
description:
Small game to test out using the amazing GB Studio

Had to make edits to Platformer.c from the ejected engine so that the player would always move to the right without need of manual joypad input. I'm sure there might be a simpler solution to this , but at least it gave me some experience with editing game engine files.

Feel free to build upon this for your own projects.

== Controls ==

B to Jump

Up/Down/Left/Right - move dino to replay button.
